CustomField.formula: IF((NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)<90, 'less than 90 days', IF((NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>=730, 'More than 2 years', IF((NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>=365,'1 to 2 years', IF((NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>=180,'181 to 365 days', IF((NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>=120,'121 to 180 days','90 to 120 days')))))
CustomField.label: Length of assessment period
